channel.title: Articles on Huzaif
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Huzaif

item.description: ‘Data is everywhere and everything in today’s day and age’ Advancement in technology has enabled us to keep our data online from our private credentials to backup of our gallery photos. You don’t need local storage and access. But there is no cloud is there? Just some server on the internet that contains our precious data, that can be used in devastating ways against us from knowing our personal info to having our every digital footprint recorded.
